TopicTitle: KOR Inc. Release Thread (Excalibur D-2 RELEASE!)

Articles.Content:
KOR Inc is proud to present the Excalibur D-2!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Complete with IVA! Enjoy! Parts are completely Career mode and Sandbox compatible.

Note: The RPM version of the cockpit is located in the spaces folder, if you wish to use it

Mediafire Download

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/287/KOR%20Inc.%20Project%20Excalibur%20?noedit=True

Project Excalibur

Update Pending

Download

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/287/KOR%20Inc.%20Project%20Excalibur%20?noedit=True

Weka Life Boat (Created by Lunniy Korabl, updated and maintained by KOR Inc.)

Download

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/285/KOR%20Inc.%20Weka%20Life%20Boat

Oooooh, looks cool. Like the models, a LOT.

FIRST!
Any chance of a rocket to lift it?
Kind of Soyuz looking. I like it.

Any chance of a rocket to lift it?

I have the models for the Stone Launch Vehicle somewhere, I just never got around to texturing them. I'll add it to the list.
howabout some Internals?
I like it. They have a hint of soyuz but are also completely their own thing.
Super simple to rig a booster for these craft. I've missed having them around!
Awesome these are back! Thanks!
Posted preview picture of Excalibur D-2 in unity with its solar collectors.

Its great to see you still are working on this mod, I have always liked these soyuz-like parts for when I do my stock-alike saves, they fill a much needed hole in that regard. Is the D-2 going to replace the earlier Excalibur parts or will it serves as a separate addition to the current parts?

Its great to see you still are working on this mod, I have always liked these soyuz-like parts for when I do my stock-alike saves, they fill a much needed hole in that regard. Is the D-2 going to replace the earlier Excalibur parts or will it serves as a separate addition to the current parts?

I plan to go back over the Original and fix a few things. Like give them IVAs. But that does mean the original Excalibur will have to be turned into a one man command pod. Unless I figure out away to squeeze in 3 kerbals.
Woo, that looks good.
Send me a few free spacecraft and I won't sue you... okay?
Figured out how to make an IVA...still needs to be modeled and textured. Did you know what I discovered? Unity hates me!

Did you know what I discovered? Unity hates me!

Don't feel bad bud, Unity hates everyone and everything....is evil!

Making IVA is a learning experience.

Anyone know a good set of props?
New rule always check for updates to parts tool before getting back into modding. Prop placement is much easier with .23
Its coming together slowly
Those MFDs are fantastic - are they your own work?

Those MFDs are fantastic - are they your own work?

They look exactly like those included in RasterPropMonitor ,what he obviously is using,so No

Neat, I remember playing with these parts back in .18-.19 or so. Glad to see them being picked up again. I'd be cool with having the original Excalibur being used as a 1 (or 2) Kerbal system, and a new 'Mark 2' with 3 Kerbals.

-Will

Yes the MFD are from RasterPropMonitor. The IVA continues along slowly but I think about ready the texture the entire model. Still trying to figure out a placement of instruments I like.

The new D-2 Excalibur reentry module will be able to support 2 kerbals, or 3 if I decided to redo the IVA and add another seat.
Faaaaaaaantastic! Great to have this back!
